title: New Dietary Guidelines May Lighten Caution Against Cholesterol
teaser: New dietary advice is on its way. A panel of top experts — appointed by the federal government — is expected to update recommendations on what we should be eating. And one thing on the mind of the panel is dietary cholesterol. Americans have been told for decades to limit cholesterol-rich foods, but advice may be changing.
contentencoded: Copyright 2015 NPR. To see more, visit http://www.npr.org/.
